name: Loverboy
content: And his lovin' makes me high
All I need is him to be my loverboy
Give me more touch me and touch me
I enjoy the way you rock me
Only you know how to make me
It's quite a bit of heaven
All I need is him to be my loverboy
Give me more touch me and touch me
I enjoy the way you rock me
Only you know how to make me
Give me more touch me and touch me
I enjoy the way you rock me
Only you know how to make me
